meanings.definition: Continuing indefinitely without coming to an end.
meanings.sent1: The nonterminating rain seemed like it would never stop.
meanings.sent2: The nonterminating line at the amusement park made everyone impatient.
meanings.sent3: The nonterminating joke had everyone laughing for hours.
meanings.sent4: The nonterminating traffic jam turned the highway into a parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The nonterminating noise from the construction site was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Failing to reach a conclusion or resolution.
meanings.sent1: The nonterminating argument between the siblings was exhausting.
meanings.sent2: The nonterminating debate in the courtroom left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent3: The nonterminating search for the missing keys turned into a game.
meanings.sent4: The nonterminating plot twists in the movie kept the audience on edge.
meanings.sent5: The nonterminating suspense in the novel kept readers hooked until the end.
